name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Accomplished Senior Software Engineer skilled in **.NET MAUI** for cross-platform mobile development, driven to implement secure coding practices in compliance with **HIPAA** and **GDPR** regulations. Proficient in **C#** and adept at utilizing **Azure services** to enhance application performance and reliability. Proven experience in establishing **CI/CD pipelines** and conducting **automated testing** to ensure high-quality software delivery. Strong problem-solving skills, excellent collaboration and communication abilities, and exceptional organizational skills that drive project success. With a robust background in developing scalable, user-centric applications across various sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, I bring a commitment to clean, efficient code that delivers significant improvements through innovative solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed a cross-platform mobile application using **.NET MAUI** and **C#**, ensuring compliance with **HIPAA** and **GDPR** regulations for secure data handling.
Implemented robust secure coding practices that improved system security posture by 30%.
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps**, leading to a 75% reduction in deployment times.
Designed and executed automated testing strategies that enhanced overall code quality, leading to 50% fewer post-deployment issues.
Implemented effective problem-solving techniques during the development process, resulting in a 40% improvement in task completion efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to refine project scope and goals, achieving alignment across business units.
Communicated complex technical concepts clearly to non-technical stakeholders, fostering transparency and understanding.
Organized project documentation and workflows, ensuring efficient resource management and team productivity.

Implemented secure coding practices while developing cross-platform mobile applications using **.NET MAUI** and **C#** to ensure compliance with **HIPAA** and **GDPR** regulations.
Designed and maintained **CI/CD pipelines** for automated testing and deployment processes, achieving a **30%** quicker delivery cycle.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver successful software solutions that improved user satisfaction by **40%**.
Developed problem-solving strategies to troubleshoot and resolve software defects, enhancing application stability by **15%**.
Organized and led code reviews, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement within the development team.

Utilized **.NET MAUI** and **C#** to develop cross-platform mobile applications, ensuring compliance with **HIPAA** and **GDPR** standards for data security.
Implemented **Azure services** to enhance application scalability and reliability, achieving a deployment success rate of **99%**.
Developed secure coding practices, reducing vulnerabilities by **40%** across all applications.
Engaged in CI/CD pipeline strategies that decreased deployment times by **30%** through continuous integration and automated testing.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software, improving communication efficiency by adopting agile frameworks.
Applied strong problem-solving and organizational skills to streamline project workflows, boosting overall team productivity.

skills:
